name: Kragma Butcher

name: Kragma Warcaller
text:
Minotaur creatures you control have haste.
Whenever a Minotaur you control attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

name: Krark-Clan Engineers

editions.flavor: "Well, I jammed the whatsit into the whackdoodle, but I think I broke the thingamajigger."

name: Krark-Clan Grunt
text: Sacrifice an artifact: Krark-Clan Grunt gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.

editions.flavor: The more weapons a goblin breaks in battle, the more respected he becomes.

name: Krark-Clan Ironworks
text: Sacrifice an artifact: Add {C}{C} to your mana pool.

editions.flavor: All the junk, refuse, and offal of the Krark Clan is diligently collected, melted down, and made into more junk, refuse, and offal.

name: Krark-Clan Ogre
text: {R}, Sacrifice an artifact: Target creature can't block this turn.

editions.flavor: The Krark Clan believes it's caught an ogre. The ogre believes he's caught seven goblins.

name: Krark-Clan Shaman
text: Sacrifice an artifact: Krark-Clan Shaman deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.

editions.flavor: "What do you mean, we're out of stuff to melt down? Give me your leg."

name: Krark-Clan Stoker
text: {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Add {R}{R} to your mana pool.

editions.flavor: Fallen enemies are fed to the scavengers. Fallen friends are thrown into the Great Furnace, their souls returned to the Great Mother.

name: Krark's Thumb
text: If you would flip a coin, instead flip two coins and ignore one.

editions.flavor:
"I can think of one goblin it ain't so lucky for."
